original_text: And the anointed priest shall take some of the blood of the bull and bring it into the tent of meeting,
korean_text: 기름 부음을 받은 제사장은 그 수송아지의 피를 가지고 회막에 들어가서

sentences.original_text: And the anointed priest shall take
sentences.korean_translation: 기름 부음 받은 제사장은 취할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: some of the blood of the bull
and bring it into the tent of meeting,
